comments:
The validator delegate WSDL4J-based WSDL Validator registered for WSDL Validator cannot be instantiated.
The validator delegate Xerces-based XML Schema Validator registered for XML Schema Validator cannot be instantiated.

Why?

Using Eclipse 3.2 and latest plugin updates.
Valentin, I saw you responded to this on the newsgroup. Can you take a look at the bug?

Kai, can you please provide a bit more information about your environment, maybe attach some info from the log? Are you seeing these messages on a new workspace or an old one? Are other WST components working OK? For example, can you open WSDL/XSD files in their respective editors?

Created an attachment (id=45822)
Screenshot of current configuration

this describes my current configuration. Is there a feature which exports the configuration to xml?

I just created an xsd and a wsdl file and they openend correct in an xml editor panel.

The startup of eclipse was without a trace in the log, but i found this after the creation of above files:

the messages dissappeared now after I made a clean build for all open projects. I tried that for some times yesterday before I opened that ticket but now it has helped.

These type of message is generated when a delegate validator class cannot be instantiated. One possible explanation is that maybe for some reason - missing prerequisites, or something else - the plugins defining these validators were not available (somehow disabled by the platform). 

Please keep an eye on it and if you find a reproducible scenario post additional comments. Thanks for trying it out.
Please reopen if more details become available.

Closing for now. Please re-open with more details if it becomes reproducible.
Regards, Valentin
